parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2
Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Model Version 1.2

cdashModelFields.definition: Describes the event or intervention whose property is being measured in --TESTCD/--TEST.
cdashModelFields.implementationNotes: The --OBJ will usually be pre-printed or hidden, and not solicited as an actual question. These FA domains are usually created by each sponsor. CDASH has used this variable in the SR domain.
cdashModelFields.label: Object of the Observation
cdashModelFields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTM variable listed in the SDTM Target column.
cdashModelFields.name: --OBJ

description: This SDTM class is a specialization of the findings general observation class. It is intended, as its name implies, to be used when collected data represent findings about an event or intervention that cannot be represented within an event or intervention record or as a supplemental qualifier to such a record. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, GNRLOBSC, C135396, 2021-06-25)
label: Findings About Events or Interventions
name: Findings About
